cookiePopup.title: Cookie notice
cookiePopup.message: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and for analytics and advertising purposes.

header.logoutError: Failed to log out. Try again or wait a few minutes, please.

inviteModal.meetingLinkTooltip: We will provide the link later unless you add it here.

slotsDescription.2: The slots can be longer than the interview meeting duration.

success.male: Thank you for providing timeslots. We will clarify with the candidate which timeslot fits best and inform you promptly
success.female: Thank you for providing timeslots. We will clarify with the candidate which timeslot fits best and inform you promptly

inviteModal.noStartTime: Please provide your availability start time
inviteModal.noEndTime: Please provide your availability end time

rejectModal.title: Reject Candidate
rejectModal.reason: Too bad. What is the reason for your decision?

success.male: It's a pity that you don't want to invite the candidate. We will inform them accordingly.
success.female: Its's a pity that you don't want to invite the candidate. We will inform them accordingly.

contactModal.messagePlaceholder: Your questions or feedback regarding the candidate or any other case.
contactModal.success: Message sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

toastMessages.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
toastMessages.noSlots: Please add at least one availability time slot.

utilityPages.notFound: Something’s wrong here. We couldn’t find a page for this link.

loginForm.sendCodeInstruction: Send the code to your phone to verify yourself.
loginForm.resendButton: Send an SMS With a Code
loginForm.toastSuccess: SMS code has been sent to your phone
loginForm.authError: Authentication error. Please try again later.
loginForm.wrongCode: The code you entered appears to be incorrect. Please try again or request a new code.

dossierExpired.title: Dossier expired
dossierExpired.heading: This page is not available anymore.
dossierExpired.message: Please contact us for more information.

tokenExpiry.expiredMessage: Your token has expired. Please log in again.
tokenExpiry.expiredError: There was an error when checking validity of your token. Please log in again.
tokenExpiry.inactivity: You've been logged out due to incativity.
